name: Writhe (Ludum Dare 33)
description:
Take control of the mysterious squid-like alien creature as it escapes from the scientific research facility that tried to contain it! Gobble up scientists to proceed, avoid the station's defenses and defeat the mysterious secret weapons project to escape once and for all!

Create for Ludum Dare #33, in which it recieved 1st place for Overall and 2nd place for Audio. This most jam version contains a few minor edits to level 5 to make the superheated surface tunnel a little easier to navigate.
